name: Shifting Squares
description:
Setup the squares and press play. Watch as your squares shift to their destination.

Complete main levels to see how the squares work and find interesting puzzles.  Solve the puzzles and find clever solutions. 

You can also create you own levels with the level editor. Simply drag the right squares in, set the right grid size and where players can pickup the squares and you are done. You can play you own levels as a custom pack.

There are currently 14 different squares and 8 different packs.  Each pack has many levels and more are coming soon with new updates.

Packs include:

  1. Basics Pack
  2. Push Pack
  3. Rotation Pack
  4. Duplicator Pack
  5. Pull Pack
  6. Destroy Pack
  7. Portal Pack
  8. Button Pack

Can you beat all the packs?

Version 1.0
